name: Individual Tax Preparation & Filing
description: Comprehensive preparation and electronic filing for individuals with W‑2, 1099, mixed income, dependents, education credits, and itemized deductions. Includes review of prior‑year returns for missed credits or deductions.

name: Self‑Employed & 1099 Income Tax Strategy
description: Tax planning and filing for contractors, gig workers, and self‑employed individuals. Includes expense categorization, home office deductions, mileage, estimated tax planning, and quarterly payment guidance.

name: Small Business & LLC Tax Filing
description: Preparation and filing for single‑member LLCs, partnerships, and S‑Corporations. Includes profit and loss review, reasonable compensation guidance, and coordination with bookkeeping records.

name: Schedule C & Side Business Reporting
description: Reporting for side businesses, consulting, and freelance work. Includes expense tracking review, depreciation, and documentation recommendations to support IRS compliance.

name: Tax Amendments & Corrections
description: Preparation and filing of amended returns to correct prior filings, claim missed credits, or address IRS notices. Includes explanation letters and documentation guidance.

name: Year‑Round Tax Planning & Advisory
description: Proactive planning sessions to reduce tax liability before year‑end. Includes withholding reviews, estimated tax calculations, entity structure discussions, and strategy for upcoming life or business changes.

name: IRS Notice & Letter Response Support
description: Review and interpretation of IRS letters and notices, with guided response strategies. Includes documentation review and preparation of response packages where applicable.

name: Document Review & Compliance Check
description: Detailed review of tax documents, income records, and prior returns to identify risks, missing forms, or inconsistencies before filing or responding to the IRS.

name: Digital Document Handling & Secure Uploads
description: Secure digital intake of IDs, Social Security cards, income forms, and supporting documents. Includes encrypted storage where applicable and controlled access for authorized staff only.

name: Electronic Signatures & Remote Approval
description: Digital signature workflows for tax documents, engagement letters, and authorizations. Clients can review, sign, and return documents from any device.
